title: Sea Me | From The Other Side

children.value: , we realized a video installation as part of the

collaborative exhibition event in Vienna/Austria. The projection screens were located in the entrance foyer of the exhibition; we showed real sea footage and the what a CycleGAN algorithm trained on facial video recordings of the artists and sea footage generates from the sea videos. In order to point out the cross-domain character of the work, we also added the sound of the sea video recordings as ambience.
Valerie Messini / Martin Gasser / Stefan Rigger

props.title: YouTube video player
